Every Day I Write the Books:
My Never-Complete Works

Stephen Huntley

Github


Personal web site and literary experiment in continuous research, authoring, curation and archiving that is instantly published digitally and always print-ready.


A continually-compiled and edited “Complete Works” that is always approaching the goal of final definitive compendium but will never reach it until I can’t type anymore.

An attempt to bridge pre-internet traditions of authoring and distributing creative and intellectual work into the current era.

More…



Latest Posts:

About the Web Site
The web site huntley.link is an attempt to build a writing platform whose contents can be formatted for either web or print publishing from the same source, in hopes of being able to preserve its contents for the long term by producing hard copies. By itself there’s nothing new about this aspiration, over the past fifteen years or so in particular a number of tools and workflows have been devised in pursuit of dual web/print publishing.
